name: Technicolor-50s-Diffusion
description:
Style Description

  • highly-saturated postcard-like colors, flat high-key lighting, strong rim-lighting, 40s and 50s lifestyle

Recommended Usage

  • Your prompt must include "tchnclr style"
  • Use CFG of 7 or 8 for best results
  • The model was trained with and excels at closeup portraits of men and women
  • Try including "glitter" in your prompt!
  • Putting "b&w" as a negative prompt will help ensure color image

Known Limitations

  • It strongly tries to insert 40s and 50s hairstyles, clothing, and scenery
  • As you can see from the examples, you can insert some modernity and blend with other styles. But if your prompt insists on all modern elements, the technicolor effect may disappear.
  • The model tends to turn men into women. It also likes to add hats!

Training Process

20 images from movies filmed in technicolor, 200 photo-like classifiers, 6000 steps, using the Dreambooth Extension for Automatic1111.

modelVersions.name: v2
modelVersions.description:
New in version 2
  • higher quality output
  • better match to the technicolor style
  • greater flexibility for diverse prompts
  • not strictly 1950's imagery
Recommended Usage
  • Add "tchnclr" and/or "1950s" to enhance the technicolor effect
  • The model was trained with and excels at closeup portraits of men and women
  • The model makes beautiful hair, and describing the hair style helps
  • Generating at 1024x with hires fix produces much better results than 512
  • Use CFG of 4-7 for best results. Yes, 4!
Known Limitations
  • Faces tend to look similar. To avoid this, prompt a celebrity at low weight or use an alternating prompt, e.g "[woman|celebrity-name]"
  • The more modernity that the prompt contains modern elements, the weaker the technicolor effect
  • Blending with other artists and art styles reduces the technicolor effect but is worth trying
Training Process
  • d8ahazard's Dreambooth Extension for Automatic1111 webUI
  • 40 high-quality training images from movies filmed in technicolor, manually captioned
  • a version with 600 photo-like classifiers merged with a version with no prior preservation to balance style and flexibility
  • 12,000 steps with a 2e-7 learning rate

meta.prompt: tchnclr style, a closeup portrait of Brenda Song, sad happy expression, wearing a glittery dress, with a blue velvety background, in the 1950s, tchnclr style
meta.negativePrompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, ugly

meta.prompt: an (female action figure:1.2) of a 40 year old woman with curly blonde hair, , wearing a satin dress and red lipstick, in a miniature model of a home, in the 1950s
meta.negativePrompt: text, watermarks, logo, error, cropped, out of frame, blurry, glitchy, artifacts, lowres, worst quality, low quality, fake, ugly, boring, mutation, deformed
